info.name: Meetme - Clean Blue/Ad Remover
info.description:
Made this theme from scratch. Its great to use alongside Adblock Plus (extension on the google apps store), if not, i have code to remove a couple of the ads.. I'll be tinkering with it here and there.
Feel free to leave feedback.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.25 - 1/17/2015
Fixed the navigation bar to not overlap the drop down menus.. This was an easy fix and i'm sorry for not fixing that before. Enjoy the change :)

Version 1.24 - 5/16/2014
Made a couple of fixes, and a few enhancements across the homepage.
Gave the chats page an upgrade.

Version 1.23 - 5/13/2014
Fixed several issues/errors

Version 1.22 - 5/13/2014
Fixed a bug with the notifications box on the homepage plus couple other small tweaks

Version 1.1 - 5/13/2014
Updated NavBar
Updated Header
Changed Background
Updated/fixed Status Box
and other various small tweaks.
